aboutMe.name: Marcos Wiendl
aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Marcos, a full stack developer focused on creating digital solutions that combine intuitive interfaces with robust back-ends. I enjoy solving problems with creativity and delivering real value to users.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I'm a graduate in Internet Systems and currently pursuing an MBA in Full Stack Web Development. I'm always evolving. In my free time, I explore new technologies, create personal projects, and follow industry trends.

item1.description: In 2021, I completed the Reserve Officers Training Center (NPOR), where I developed leadership, discipline, teamwork, and decision-making skills under pressure. Throughout the year, I received both practical and theoretical training in tactics, military organization, and logistics, culminating in my appointment as an Aspirant Officer in the reserve.

item2.description: I work on the ideation, planning, and execution of academic and multidisciplinary software projects. As a member of LATIM’s Projects Committee, I collaborate with diverse teams to develop technological solutions—from requirements gathering to the delivery of functional systems.

project1.title: Finapp API
project1.description: Robust RESTful API built with Java and Spring Boot for personal finance management. Features JWT authentication with refresh tokens, collaborative goals between users, income and expense tracking, real-time balance calculation, and password recovery via email.

project2.title: Valorize
project2.description: Fixed-income investment simulator supporting major asset types, with charts and progress metrics.

project3.title: FaceVectors
project3.description: Web tool for facial vector recognition, with saved user identification, estimated gender, and real-time age detection.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description1: Have an idea in mind or want to exchange experiences about technology and development?
contact.description2: I'm always open to new challenges and good conversations.
